Articles.Content:
Hi, what connectors / docking ports do i need for the ISS? Do i even need ports for the truss segments and how do i attach the first truss to the station? do i just put it on the Z1(?) segment and it will dock automatically?

the mod i'm using is bobcat ISSmod

 

Edited November 15, 2016 by soffver
The trusses had there owe docking ports they look just a small piece of the truss and i always launch the middle truss on the Z1 segment
okey, thx fount it, do you remember how i connect the truss S0 to the actual station? how to i dock it?
